snippet: Senator Michael D. Crapo, Republican of Idaho, pleaded guilty on Friday to driving while intoxicated and then apologized and asked for the forgiveness of his constituents.
abstract: Idaho Sen Michael D Crapo pleads guilty to driving while intoxicated in Alexandria, Va; also apologizes and asks for forgiveness of his constituents.
lead_paragraph: Senator Michael D. Crapo, Republican of Idaho, pleaded guilty on Friday to driving while intoxicated and then apologized and asked for the forgiveness of his constituents.

headline.main: Virginia: Senator Sentenced for Drunken Driving
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Senator Sentenced For Drunken Driving
